channel.title: McCain gets 'Rolled
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_TiQCJXpbKg
Thought I'd share it here, as I found it holarious and I now think of it as one of the best "rick-rolls" out there. Just the look on McCain's face when the audience starts ch... ah you'll see for yourself.
Not much to discuss about just how much politics fail etc etc, so discuss!

item.title: McCain gets 'Rolled
item.dc:creator: @postmanpat9 postmanpat9
item.description:

item.title: McCain gets 'Rolled
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:16, topic:230171”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=302943.msg2430244#msg2430244 date=1220821436]
Can’t you do it with any background that’s a solid color? But on topic, this is hysterical, i thought it was real the first time i watched it, especially with mccain’s expression.
[/quote]

Well you can, but wasn’t the whole point of it being green was so it would be easier to work with?[/quote]

Sometimes it’s better to use blue.
Like when you have a greenscreen behind a leprechan.

Read full topic

item.title: McCain gets 'Rolled
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:11, topic:230171”][quote author=Frell link=topic=302943.msg2430240#msg2430240 date=1220821173]
It is fake, My dad watch the whole speech. If you notice, the screen behind him was BLUE when it started, Meaning that they can use the blue-screen software.

They took the shocked faces and everything from is POW story, about how the Vietnamese broke his bones, let him heal, then break them again. Repeatedly.
[/quote]We know. Plus, last time I checked, wasn’t it green screen?[/quote]
You can do it with blue also.

Read full topic

item.title: McCain gets 'Rolled
item.dc:creator: @reVein reVein
item.description:
@reVein wrote:

rifk that’s fucking funny.
“It was real and it was the most disgraceful part of this presidential campaign. I think the technician that locked himself in the media feed closet was actually working for Obama’s campaign.”

HAHAH AND OBAMA SAID “NEVER GONNA TELL MY WIFE, AND HURT YOU!”

Read full topic

item.title: McCain gets 'Rolled
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:3, topic:230171”][quote author=Thug-life link=topic=302943.msg2429973#msg2429973 date=1220811390]
Wait, what? I thought this was fake… I never heard anything on it.
[/quote]Never said it was real. Still, a priceless laugh.[/quote]
Yeah, i mean it looks pretty real but the way you worded your post made me think that you actually believed it.
